item.title: Docker basics
item.description: 01. Intro & Docker basics Why you should learn Docker and Kubernetes? Docker and Kubernetes is most trending and loved platform in DevOps world, I collected some metrics from StackOverflow, you can see as below: This is not only the reason you should learn Kubernetes, I think this will give you same fun and interest that you have with learning Linux. So join me learning Kubernetes. Before moving forward lets check history, how it started and what was the main focused.
